name: Luggy! Ninja Girls
description:
Luggy! Ninja Girls! The best videogame ever made!

Meet your favorite characters from Moe! Ninja Girls once again, many years later! Click on a button to progress the story! Shriek at how amazingly good the cgs are! Have an eargasm at the incredible soundtrack which was absolutely not stolen from videogames!

Many years after you left highschool and your friends, your life has went down a downwards spiral and you're now a weeb who only watches anime while wearing  doritos and makes money in shady ways. One day, a familiar figure knocks at your door.
